examples: The disconnection of the power cable shut down all the computers.

definitions.definition: Unexpected termination of a telephone connection.
examples: A sudden disconnection cut me off in mid-phrase.

definitions.definition: Absence of rapport ; the nonexistence of, or a breakdown of, effective communication .
examples: There was a hopeless disconnection between the weary, old teacher and the spirited, young students.

secondary_definitions: Unexpected termination of a telephone connection.
Absence of rapport ; the nonexistence of, or a breakdown of, effective communication .
